      • Data

        public Data(java.lang.String table)
     throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
            java.sql.SQLException,
            NoValueException,
            DatabaseConnectionException,
            EmptySetException
        Instantiate a source data.
        Parameters:
        table - The name of the table of the database.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when jdbc driver wasn't loaded
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown when an SQLException occurs
        NoValueException - Thrown when no value was found
        DatabaseConnectionException - Thrown when an error to connect to the database occurs
        EmptySetException - Thrown when the dataset is empty
